经典，神作，伟大
2022年5月20日更新
明天就准备换新电脑了，刚好打到在灯塔与运输机大战（算上以前的话不知道几周目了）或许是时候告别一段时间了，当音乐想起的时候真的是泪崩，其实我对游戏的评价都很大度，上古卷轴，羞辱，生化奇兵什么的我基本是拿起来就狠狠地吹，但是半条命2或许，不，永远是我心目中的无法撼动的第一神作，而这份感情里不仅有赞叹一个04年的游戏品质如此之高，更是半条命2对我的童年有无穷的意义，还是那三个词，经典，神作，伟大。
2022年5月22日更新
新电脑还没到，又是快快乐乐半条命的一天，难度设置简直匠心独运，补给弹药布置也是到心坎里去嘞，越是激动越发想半条命3

One of the best games I've ever played in my life

[h1] Una secuela digna para una saga importante  [/h1]
Si la historia de por sí te enganchaba con la primera entrega, en esta secuela no la olvidarás. Half-Life 2 superó por mucho lo antes logrado con el anterior título, se implementó el nuevo (para aquel entonces)  motor gráfico de Valve llamado Source Engine, lo que supuso una mejora en el apartado gráfico y en el apartado técnico. Asegurados serán los minutos que se desperdician experimentando con las físicas desde el primer momento, o al menos eso me pasó la primera vez. El juego hace muy buen balance entre los momentos de acción, para resolver pequeños puzzles y hasta los de suspenso con una pizca de horror (y sí, me refiero a ti Ravenholm). Es un juego divertido en general y la trama se expande increíblemente bien, así que ponte tu traje mejorado Mark V y adéntrate en Ciudad 17, que ya es la hora Dr. Freeman.

This game is an absolute must have. It was revolutionary in terms of just about everything back when it was released almost 18 years ago, and has just aged beautifully. IMO it still looks fantastic and has very aesthetically pleasing graphics in a way that only the Source engine can have. It's always a blast to play, with great environments, atmosphere, characters, voice acting, story, and S tier gameplay. It's an outstanding game across the board.

Half-Life is an amazing game for it's time and still amazes people to this day with it's graphics, storytelling and physics system. Although I usually speed through most of the game, I absolutely recommend this.
half life 2 cool

Oh my oh my, this was a good one! The enemies, the atmosphere, the characters, the weapons, the puzzles and the plot. My god do I love this game. This was my first time playing through it and loved everything about it! I would personally consider it one of my favourite games ever and will definitely play through it again. The graphics have aged surprisingly well; The overall story was pretty confusing but eventually understood most of it as I progressed through the game. Thank you Valve for this amazing experience! :D

How incredible is it that a game from 2004, eighteen years ago, still seems to trump almost everything that's being released today? Saying that Half-Life 2 is a great game is like saying that The Godfather is a great film, it simply goes without saying. Just play the Ravenholm level and tell me what other video game levels even come close to achieving that same sort of atmosphere, tension, and world-building.

good game, much better than the first game. wish the episodes were combined into this game but thats not a big deal. all half life games kinda feel repetitive thats why i prefer the portal series. worth the money tho as this game is old as shit.

Beautiful and fun experience for all. Not too hard, not too easy. A great sequel, really brings much more to the story. Great mechanics, really easy to understand, the game doesn't really hold your hand, in regard to where you need to go next, it lets you explore, and find something interesting every once in a while. Overall, wonderful game...........can't wait for Half-Life 3.
